full_summary:
### Facilities Maintenance and Support Services

#### Tender Details

* Tender ID: MX-42822518423
* Solicitation Number: TT24FM01
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2023-07-28
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-13 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-13

#### Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting proposals from qualified firms to provide facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) in various locations across Canada. The services are required for installations located in Greater Toronto Area, Southwestern Ontario, and Northeastern Ontario.

#### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be required to provide maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure, as per the defined property limits. The services will need to meet the required standards to prevent the deterioration of the buildings beyond normal wear and tear. The contractor will be required to mobilize and commence providing the services by the Service Commencement date.

#### Contract Term

The initial Period of Service will be five (5) years. The contract may be extended for a maximum of one (1) additional three (3) year period and another one (1) two (2) year period, resulting in a total possible contract duration of ten (10) years.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the Request for Proposals (RFP).

#### Procurement Procedures

This tender follows procurement procedures in accordance with all internal and international free trade agreements that Canada has entered into. The security requirements for this project are outlined in the RFP documents.

#### Bidding Information

Firms interested in submitting their proposals must register on the MERX Electronic Bidding System. The bid closing date and time are 2023-09-13 (14:00:00). Proponents can obtain contract award results from the DCC website.

#### Contact Information
